abstract: Byliner, a digital publisher, and Amazon have delved into the genre in recent months, and a serialized novel will be available on Apple devices on Monday.
snippet: Byliner, a digital publisher, and Amazon have delved into the genre in recent months, and a serialized novel will be available on Apple devices on Monday.
lead_paragraph: Could serialized fiction finally force the e-book to evolve?

headline.main: E-Books Expand Their Potential With Serialized Fiction
headline.print_headline: E-Books Stretch Boundaries With Serialized Fiction
